title: Put a smile on your face! You've just found the right place!
posting_body: ['RENT:', '$1405/Month |', 'SIZE:', '732 sq ft |', 'BEDROOMS:', '1 |', 'BATHROOMS:', '1', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'ABOUT COMMUNITY:', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park.", 'Pet Policy: A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '− Air Conditioning', '− All electric', '− Dining Room', '− Disposal', '− Extra Storage', '− Handrails', '− Office', '− Oven', '− Pantry', '− Sprinkler System', '− 9 foot ceiling', '− Broadband access', '− Contemporary floor plans', '− Crown Molding', '− Deck', '− Fully equipped modern kitchens', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Large walk-in closets', '− Recreation Room', '− Upgrade Unit', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '− BBQ/Picnic Area', '− Business Center', '− Conference Room', '− Courtyard', '− Fitness Center', '− Gameroom', '− Laundry Facility', '− Maintenance on site', '− Multi Use Room', '− Porch', '− Car Care Center', '− Controlled Access', '− Detached garages', '− Lake view', '− Online Services', '− Package Service', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Public Transportation', '− Sundeck', 'CONTACT US TODAY!', 'Walden Brook', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '02980EC4E78842']
